title: where is draft queue?
body: i understand why ranked is disabled, but draft is gone too?

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up, friends!  I'm not sure why normal draft would be disabled, but I'll pass the info to interested parties!

same here, i dont want to play {{champion:64}}  mode


edit: I just restarted client and it showed up... its all fine

I was wondering the same..

 I thought I was just dumb and couldnt find the option to enter draft..
I'm able to see Draft pick now!  Is this still an issue for anyone?
